thread.title: Loulou

author: Loulou
title: Loulou
text: I had seen perfect fit blinds on a few sites but more expensive than here for my sizes. I needed 4 but just ordered 1 to ensure quality and fit etc was what i wanted. It came quickly and fitted and looked amazing! So i ordered the other 3. Easy to fit, they look stylish and classy and were well worth what i paid and again, cheaper than other sites for the same product. Fast delivery and great quality, ive recommended them to about ten people already! Fab.
